title: "Pitbulls are nice depending on how you raise them"
body:
Hahah, okay.

Join the rest of the families that kept "friendly" pitbulls  in their houses and then one day they decide to bite little johnies whole fucking face and nose off.

Check out the thousands of fucking news articles on shit like that.

But right, if you give em Scooby snacks they'll be real nice devils.

Jus' saying.
